text: The President of Ukraine (, Prezydent Ukrayiny) is the Ukrainian head of state. The President represents the nation in international relations, administers the foreign political activity of the state, conducts negotiations and concludes international treaties. The current president is Volodymyr Zelenskyy. ==List== ==Living former presidents== File:Kuchmaukraine.jpg|2nd Leonid Kuchma (1994–2005) File:Wiktor Juschtschenko, Präsident der Ukraine, in der Universität Zürich.jpg|3rd Viktor Yushchenko (2005–2010) File:Viktor Yanukovych Greece 2011 (cropped).jpg|4th Viktor Yanukovych (2010–2014) File:Oleksandr Turchynov 2012-10-19.jpg|Acting Oleksandr Turchynov (2014) File:Official portrait of Petro Poroshenko.jpg|5th Petro Poroshenko (2014–2019) * Category:Government of Ukraine
title: President of Ukraine
